FROM tb_returndir rd inner join tb_orderdir od on rd.orderid = od.orderid inner join tb_orderinfo oi on od.order_id = oi.order_id inner join tb_sales sa on sa.sales_id = oi.sales_id inner join tb_comp cp on cp.comp_id = oi.comp_id where rd.return_id = #{return_id}
